title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From concept to production: Build with spec-driven development & Kiro  (DVT320)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从概念到生产：使用规范驱动开发和 Kiro 进行构建 (DVT320)
abstract: Join us for an exciting live coding session where we'll demonstrate the power of spec-driven development using Kiro, the AI IDE that's transforming how we build applications. Watch as we take a simple prompt and transform it into a fully functional application through Kiro's structured approach. You'll see firsthand how Kiro converts requirements into clear specifications, system designs, and discrete tasks while maintaining robust engineering practices.
abstract_cn: 加入我们激动人心的实时编码会议，我们将演示使用 Kiro 进行规范驱动开发的强大功能。Kiro 是一款正在改变我们构建应用程序方式的 AI IDE。观看我们如何通过 Kiro 的结构化方法，将一个简单的提示转换为功能完整的应用程序。您将亲眼看到 Kiro 如何将需求转换为清晰的规范、系统设计和离散任务，同时保持稳健的工程实践。
